content:
For slow internet connections, following loading screen appears. Probably its design could be improved. Shall I open an issue?
image.png
I would love a GIF being there.
Part of the problem there is that the foreground color but not the background color is taken from the dark mode theme.

GIF sounds great, we could use a spinner too.
indeed @Anders Kaseorg

http://gph.is/2fVannu
Found this cool spinner over the web. It also goes with dark theme. @Aman Agrawal (amanagr) thoughts?

We canâ€™t just pick a random GIF on the web. We need to respect copyright and licensing. And we already have a few loading animations (static/js/loading.js, static/images/loader.svg, static/images/loading-ellipsis.svg), so we should try to be consistent and reuse where it makes sense.

But the first step should be to fix the colors.
Yeah, I agree; I'd try something like a medium-sized Zulip logo with our standard loading spinner around it.
This loading screen has been replaced with something that is actually styled.
I suspect there's more we can do to make it nice, and there may be some details that are off, but it's certainly a lot nicer! Huge thanks to @Jore for making this happen.
No worries! Thanks everyone! :+1:
